DOC.brief_summary: Total arytenoidectomy claim increase risk aspiration cause voice loss operation perform bilateral vocal fold paralysis ( BVFP ) . However , objective evidence conclusion lack . There study compare swallow voice total partial arytenoidectomy .
DOC.brief_title: Total Versus Partial Arytenoidectomy Bilateral Vocal Fold Paralysis
DOC.detailed_description: Design : Prospective , randomize , double-blind , case-control Setting : Tertiary , referral , university Patients : Twenty patient BVFP Intervention : Endoscopic total partial arytenoidectomy
DOC.criteria: Bilateral vocal fold paralysis Previously operate patient
